data.actual_result: Game opens up with Generic 100% zoom level
data.expected_result: Game should open up with correct zoom level
data.short_description: [Overlay] Overlay is always starts @ 100% zoom level when opening overlay
data.steps_to_repro: -  Set discord zoom to something other than 100%  - Open a game with overlay  - Open overlay and observe the size of things.  - Tab back into discord and change zoom size (CTRL +/-)  - Tab back into game and notice that it's updated it's size - Image 1 = 100% (Just started overlay) - Image 2 = 90% (my normal zoom)
